__e: I guess for some of us it just takes longer than others.
It won't take more than an hour. But as you please.
Yes, and time seems so much longer without you
Besides, it ain't the kind that takes that long.
Why does it take so long to know what you got that's good?
That's funny, you don't strike me as the delayed gratification type.
Really? You were in there a while.
You know that for every minute you delay going through that door and I have to listen to this, that's another lap around the field?
It takes a long time to become a man.
How long do you think it'll take the cops to come looking for you?
How long would it take her to get from the church back to her home?
Takes about a year to get there, but it's worth it, I guess.
It takes too long to get from one to the other.
* Mummy always wonders why it takes twice as long to get home from school as it does to get there. *
Doesrt take much time if you know what you're doing.
* Mummy always wonders why it takes twice as long to get home from school as it does to get there. *
I mean, that takes most people such a long time to figure out, believe me.
Takes a little longer, but might as well while we're here, right?
Sometimes it takes me a while, and I like to have something to read while it's going on.
For you it's easy, but a face like his takes a little longer.
Yeah, it takes a while to get the hang of new powers, plus you're not in the same emotional state you were downstairs.
It's taken a while, though. I'm ... a unique case.
Takes me a few minutes to realise I'm not, then I get up, I walk the dog, and the day just goes by.
